summary: A work in progress overhaul of numerous interior locations throughout Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
\"Interiors Of Skyrim\" is a work in progress overhaul of numerous interior locations throughout Skyrim; An attempt to reach the full potential which Skyrim\'s vanilla interior\'s hold. I will therefore: Be utilizing static vanilla items, deploying  various lighting techniques and choices, correcting unrealistic floating banners and ect. Overall, you can expect the interiors of Skyrim, to through this mod, become alive with their full potential, filling with warmth and creative embellishment which reflect each interior\'s vanilla purpose and nature.

\"Interiors Of Skyrim\" Requires only vanilla Skyrim, I will likely upload optional DLC content eventually.

Please report any and all abnormalities, bugs, requests, suggestions to the comments section of the mod page.

Compatibility; \"Interiors Of Skyrim\" should prove compatible with mods such as Realistic Lighting Overhaul, that is as far as not causing CTD, however, I cannot guarantee you will like the result. 

\"Interiors Of Skyrim\" will be produced for the following locations (List subject to change).
In THREE groupings separate for download; 1.Keeps 2.Temples 3.Inns

Dragonsreach (Temporarily Suspended)
Blue Palace (Temporarily Suspended)
Understone Keep (Incomplete)
Mistveil Keep (Incomplete)
Palace of The Kings (Incomplete)
Temple of Divines (Incomplete)
Temple of Talos (Incomplete)
Temple of Mara (Incomplete)
Temple of Kynareth (Incomplete)
Honorhall Orphanage (Harthfire)

Inns and Taverns (In Progress)
=================================
Dawnstar Windpeak Inn V1.0
Dragonbridge FourShields Tavern V1.0
Falkreath Dead Man\'s Drink V1.0
Iverstead Vilemyr Inn
Kynesgrove Braidwood Inn
Markarth Silverblood Inn
Morthal Moorside Inn
Nightgate Inn
Old Hroldan Inn
Riften The Bee and Barb
Riften Haelga\'s Bunkhouse
Riverwood Sleeping Giant Inn 
Rorikstead Frostfruit Inn
Solitude The Winking Skeever
Whiterun The Bannered Mare
Whiterun The Drunken Huntsman
Windhelm Candlehearth Hall
Winterhold The Frozen Hearth

*The above list will be updated frequently, however is in no particular order. Please be patient, I am one teenager working on all that has been described.
